title: [WIP] Expose the SKRuntimeEffect APIs
body:
**Description of Change**

Expose the SKRuntimeEffect APIs.

This PR also has some hacky changes just to get it to compiled as there was an update to native skia required.

**Bugs Fixed**

- Fixes #1218
